pull.title: fuzz: doc: remove any mention to `address_deserialize_v2`
pull.body: We don't have `address_deserialize_v2` target anymore since fac81affb527132945773a5315bd27fec61ec52f (we used to have `address_deserialize_v1_notime`, `address_deserialize_v1_withtime` and `address_deserialize_v2` but now we only have a single `address_deserialize` target) so it removes any mention to it.

events.message: fuzz: doc: remove any mention to address_deserialize_v2
